text: Nabiyow ama korosuk ixxic: diggah anu inni Rabbik Baxxaqqa iyya diinih Bagul aniyo isin woo diini dirabbosseeniih anu isin obtim kak faxxan digaalay edde Qataataktaana oobisaamih dudda mayyu, woo digaalah wadirroysiyyih mekla num mali inki Yalla akke waytek, usuk cakki meklaah Baxxaqqa kaa haa, usuk cakkii kee deedal ittak Baxsa marak inkih kayrih aysuk Raaqa
